revised_title: Effect of Nitrate-Nitrogen on Nodule Symbioses in Coriaria and Hippophae
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the effect of nitrate-nitrogen on the nodule symbioses of Coriaria and Hippophae plants. They found that plant growth was promoted by the supplied nitrogen, but nodule growth and nitrogen fixation per plant were depressed. The study provides insights into the role of nitrate-nitrogen in nodule symbioses and its implications for the biosphere.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
